opennlp.ccg.lexicon
Interface Word.WordFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
FactorChainWord.Factory, FullWord.Factory
Enclosing class:
Word
public static interface Word.WordFactory

Factory interface.

Method Summary
 Word create(String form)
          Creates a surface word with the given interned form.
 Word create(String attr, String val)
          Creates a (surface or full) word with the given normalized attribute name and value.
 Word create(String form, String pitchAccent, List<Pair<String,String>> attrValPairs, String stem, String POS, String supertag, String semClass)
          Creates a (surface or full) word from the given canonical factors.
 

Method Detail

create

Word create(String form)
Creates a surface word with the given interned form.

create

Word create(String attr,
            String val)
Creates a (surface or full) word with the given normalized attribute name and value. The attribute names Tokenizer.WORD_ATTR, ..., Tokenizer.SEM_CLASS_ATTR may be used for the form, ..., semantic class.

create

Word create(String form,
            String pitchAccent,
            List<Pair<String,String>> attrValPairs,
            String stem,
            String POS,
            String supertag,
            String semClass)
Creates a (surface or full) word from the given canonical factors.
